X509Certificate

X509Certificate

A representation for a X509 Certificate, with methods to parse, verify and sign it.  Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.

This isn’t used anywhere so far.  It would become useful if we started to offer facilities to generate and sign X509 certificates.

Parameters

key
algo

getPublicKey

public function getPublicKey():RSAKey

getSubjectPrincipal

public function getSubjectPrincipal():String

Returns a subject principal, as an opaque base64 string.  This is only used as a hash key for known certificates.

Note that this assumes X509 DER-encoded certificates are uniquely encoded, as we look for exact matches between Issuer and Subject fields.

getIssuerPrincipal

public function getIssuerPrincipal():String

Returns an issuer principal, as an opaque base64 string.  This is only used to quickly find matching parent certificates.

Note that this assumes X509 DER-encoded certificates are uniquely encoded, as we look for exact matches between Issuer and Subject fields.
